scripts.migration:generate:
npm run build && run typeorm -- migration:show | grep '^\[ \]' && echo '
Pending migrations found, aborting
Run the migrations first: `npm run migration:deploy`' && exit 1 || npm run typeorm -- migration:generate src/providers/db/migrations/$npm_config_name
scripts.migration:deploy: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- migration:run
scripts.migration:undo: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- migration:revert
